title: GET_CURRENT_PED_WEAPON
content:
0xB0237302// GetCurrentPedWeapon
Hash GET_CURRENT_PED_WEAPON(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target ped.Returns: The weapon hash.Returns the hash of weapon the Ped is currently using.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_CURRENT_PED_WEAPON
GetCurrentPedWeapon(ped)
